definition: subject (in an experiment)/participant (in a clinical trial etc)
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The team found the sense of ownership still occurred when participants' fingers were anaesthetized.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員發現當受試者的手指被麻醉時，仍有感知。

sentences.english: For comparison, participants in the other group weren't asked to eat watercress.
sentences.chinese: 相對比，在另外一組的受試者沒有要求喫豆瓣菜。

sentences.english: Functional magnetic resonance imaging of activity in the subjects' brains hints at a possible explanation.
sentences.chinese: 受試者的大腦活動的核磁共振成像暗示着一個解釋。

sentences.english: And all subjects' plasma LPA were extracted by means of quantitative inorganic phosphorus.
sentences.chinese: 並採用無機磷定量法提取全部受試者血漿LPA。

sentences.english: You bring people in the lab.
A Grammaticality Judgment Test (henceforth GJT) was conducted with 68 participants.
sentences.chinese: 本研究進行了有68名受試者參與的語法判斷測試。

sentences.english: The design was randomized crossover, within-subject.
sentences.chinese: 實驗設計是在受試者內隨機交換。

sentences.english: In the clinical trial, every body felt well and no side-effect was observed.
sentences.chinese: 所有受試者主觀感覺良好，無過敏等副作用。

sentences.english: Each group was subdivided randomly into two parallel sub-groups.
sentences.chinese: 每一組受試者被任意分爲兩個平行小組。

sentences.english: They asked subjects to fill out a questionnaire after dinner on Thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 他們讓受試者在用過感恩節晚餐之後填寫一份問卷。

sentences.english: Group A and B were given assigned dose-combination by intramuscular injection.
sentences.chinese: 和B組受試者按要求接受指定的配伍劑量注射。

sentences.english: All 11C-PIB PET images were visually interpreted and analyzed by the Region of Interest(ROI) method.
sentences.chinese: 通過視覺分析各組受試者的圖像，總結成像特點。

sentences.english: The volunteers also wore pedometers to count their steps.
sentences.chinese: 受試者同時也佩戴計步器來計算步數。

sentences.english: Would having a relevant parable uppermost in their minds nudge participants into helping?
sentences.chinese: 腦袋裏想着這個寓言故事會促使受試者去幫助他人嗎？

sentences.english: None of the participants was a smoker or had diabetes or high blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 受試者沒有嗜煙或者罹患糖尿病高血壓的病史。

definition: to accompany/(of a doctor etc) to do a follow-up (on a patient, client etc)
World Health Organization (WHO)/abbr. for 世界衛生組織|世界卫生组织[Shi4 jie4 Wei4 sheng1 Zu3 zhi1]
